textContents: Steel Trap? | China builds more mills in the face of a glut
Change in GDP from a year earlier, quarterly
...the country is turning to investment spending, especially in the steel industry.
But the industry is losing money as domestic demand declines...
...leading to concerns that China will boost steel exports, prompting trade fights, as the world deals with a steel glut.
*2012 figure is through the first quarter.
Sources: China's National Bureau of Statistics (GDP); Citigroup (China steel); OECD; World Steel Dynamics
